subject: On-line generic store
body:
Dear valued member.
Good news from MyCanadianPharmacy. Spring discounts for all our customers. 
Your health and wellness is the main focus of our professional team and we are glad to offer you really top quality products. 
Click here and see a wide range of products to choose fromhttp://similarsegment.hk
Our customers appreciate the level of our service and fast delivery.
Yours faithfully,Scotty Lam
